summary.span: 表示一组数据命令和一个数据库连接，它们用于填充 和更新数据源。

span.span: Represents a set of data commands and a database connection that are used to fill the and update the data source.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 用作之间的桥梁和用于检索和保存数据的数据源。The serves as a bridge between a and data source for retrieving and saving data. 通过使用提供此桥将数据从数据源到，并使用发送中所做更改回数据源。The provides this bridge by using to load data from the data source into the , and using to send changes made in the back to the data source. 当填充，如果不存在，它将创建相应的表和列返回的数据。When the fills a , it will create the appropriate tables and columns for the returned data if they do not already exist. 但是，主键信息不包含在隐式创建的架构除非属性设置为。However, primary key information is not included in the implicitly created schema unless the property is set to . 你可能还有创建的架构，包括主键信息、 使用数据填充它之前。You may also have the create the schema of the , including primary key information, before filling it with data using . 有关详细信息，请参阅[将现有约束添加到数据集](~/docs/framework/data/adonet/adding-existing-constraints-to-a-dataset.md)。For more information, see [Adding Existing Constraints to a DataSet](~/docs/framework/data/adonet/adding-existing-constraints-to-a-dataset.md). 请注意某些 OLE DB 访问接口，包括 MSDataShape 提供程序，不返回基表或主键信息。Note that some OLE DB providers, including the MSDataShape provider, do not return base table or primary key information. 因此，无法正确设置上创建的所有属性。Therefore, the cannot correctly set the property on any created . 在这些情况下应显式指定中的表的主键。In these cases you should explicitly specify primary keys for tables in the . 还包括， ， ， ，和属性以便于加载和更新的数据。The also includes the , , , , and properties to facilitate the loading and updating of data. 当你创建的实例，属性设置为其初始值。When you create an instance of , properties are set to their initial values. 有关这些值的列表，请参阅构造函数。For a list of these values, see the constructor. ## Examples 下面的示例使用，和，若要从访问数据源，选择的记录，然后填充与所选的行。The following example uses the , and , to select records from an Access data source, and populate a with the selected rows. 实心随后会返回。The filled is then returned. 若要完成此操作，该方法传递初始化，连接字符串和是一个 SQL SELECT 语句的查询字符串。To accomplish this, the method is passed an initialized , a connection string, and a query string that is an SQL SELECT statement. [!code-csharp[Classic WebData OleDbDataAdapter Example#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_ADO.NET/Classic WebData OleDbDataAdapter Example/CS/source.cs#1)] [!code-vb[Classic WebData OleDbDataAdapter Example#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_ADO.NET/Classic WebData OleDbDataAdapter Example/VB/source.vb#1)]

remarks.format: ## Remarks 此实现的打开和关闭如果尚未打开。This implementation of the opens and closes an if it is not already open. 这很有用的应用程序必须调用中方法为两个或多个对象。This can be useful in an application that must call the method for two or more objects. 如果是已打开，你必须明确地调用或**释放**以将其关闭。If the is already open, you must explicitly call or **Dispose** to close it. 当你创建的实例，以下的读/写属性设置为以下的初始值。When you create an instance of , the following read/write properties are set to the following initial values. |属性Properties|初始值Initial value| |----------------|-------------------| ||`MissingMappingAction.Passthrough`| ||`MissingSchemaAction.Add`| 你可以更改通过单独属性调用这些属性的值。You can change the value of either of these properties through a separate call to the property. ## Examples 下面的示例创建并设置其属性的一些。The following example creates an and sets some of its properties. remarks.format: ## Remarks 期间，如果未设置此属性和主键信息位于、可以自动生成，如果你设置属性和使用。During , if this property is not set and primary key information is present in the , the can be generated automatically if you set the property and use the . 然后，你未设置任何其他命令都由。Then, any additional commands that you do not set are generated by the . 此生成的逻辑需要要中存在的键列信息。This generation logic requires key column information to be present in the . 有关详细信息，请参阅[使用 Commandbuilder 生成命令](~/docs/framework/data/adonet/generating-commands-with-commandbuilders.md)。For more information, see [Generating Commands with CommandBuilders](~/docs/framework/data/adonet/generating-commands-with-commandbuilders.md). 当分配到以前创建、不克隆。When is assigned to a previously created , the is not cloned. 保留以前创建的引用对象。The maintains a reference to the previously created object. ## Examples 下面的示例创建和设置和属性。The following example creates an and sets the and properties. 它假定你已创建对象。It assumes that you have already created an object. [!code-csharp[Classic WebData DbDataAdapter.DeleteCommand Example#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_ADO.NET/Classic WebData DbDataAdapter.DeleteCommand Example/CS/source.cs#1)] [!code-vb[Classic WebData DbDataAdapter.DeleteCommand Example#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_ADO.NET/Classic WebData DbDataAdapter.DeleteCommand Example/VB/source.vb#1)]

remarks.format: ## Remarks ActiveX 数据对象 (ADO) 和 ADO.NET 之间的链接是一个单向操作，因为在可以将数据复制到的 ADO ，但必须由 ADO.NET 处理数据的任何更新。The link between ActiveX Data Objects (ADO) and ADO.NET is a one-way operation in that you can copy data from ADO to the , but any updates to the data must be handled by ADO.NET. 方法循环访问多个结果通过调用`NextRecordset`方法`Recordset`，关闭输入`Recordset`完成操作。The method iterates through multiple results by calling the `NextRecordset` method on the `Recordset`, closing the input `Recordset` on completion of the operation. 操作将行添加到指定目标对象在，则创建对象如果它尚不存在。The operation adds the rows to the specified destination object in the , creating the object if it does not already exist. 当你创建对象，操作通常只创建列名称元数据。When you create a object, the operation ordinarily creates only column name metadata. 但是，如果属性设置为`AddWithKey`，还会创建相应的主键约束。However, if the property is set to `AddWithKey`, appropriate primary keys and constraints are also created. 如果主键信息存在，则协调任何重复的行，并且只能出现一次在相对应的。If primary key information is present, any duplicate rows are reconciled and only appear one time in the that corresponds to the . 主键信息可能被设置通过，通过指定属性，或通过设置属性`AddWithKey`。Primary key information may be set either through , by specifying the property of the , or by setting the property to `AddWithKey`. 用于 OLE DB，正常使用.NET Framework 数据提供程序`AddWithKey`需要通过设置 DBPROP_UNIQUEROWS 属性时，获取所需的主要密钥信息，然后确定哪些列是主键的本机 OLE DB 访问接口通过检查 DBCOLUMN_KEYCOLUMN 中的列**IColumnsRowset**。To function correctly with the .NET Framework Data Provider for OLE DB, `AddWithKey` requires the native OLE DB provider to obtain required primary key information by setting the DBPROP_UNIQUEROWS property, and then determine which columns are primary key columns by examining DBCOLUMN_KEYCOLUMN in the **IColumnsRowset**. 或者用户可能显式设置每个主键约束。Alternatively the user may explicitly set the primary key constraints on each . 这将确保对与现有记录匹配的传入记录进行更新，而不是追加。This ensures that incoming records that match existing records are updated instead of appended. 如果 返回 OUTER JOIN 的结果，则 `DataAdapter` 不会为生成的 设置 值。If the returns the results of an OUTER JOIN, the `DataAdapter` does not set a value for the resulting . 您必须显式定义为主键，以确保正确解析重复行。You must explicitly define the primary key to make sure that duplicate rows are resolved correctly. 有关详细信息，请参阅[定义主键](~/docs/framework/data/adonet/dataset-datatable-dataview/defining-primary-keys.md)。For more information, see [Defining Primary Keys](~/docs/framework/data/adonet/dataset-datatable-dataview/defining-primary-keys.md). 如果`Recordset`的开始之前关闭操作，不会产生错误。If the `Recordset` is closed before the starting of the operation, no error results. 这是处理多个结果所必需的因为不返回行的查询指示通过关闭`Recordset`。This is required for handling of multiple results, because queries that do not return rows are indicated by a closed `Recordset`. 只调用`NextRecordset`上的已关闭`Recordset`，继续进行处理。The just calls `NextRecordset` on the closed `Recordset` and continues processing. 如果填充数据集时遇到错误，错误发生之前添加的行将保留在。If an error is encountered while populating the data set, rows added before the occurrence of the error remain in the . 该操作的其余部分将会中止。The rest of the operation is aborted. 如果对象在填充时遇到重复的列，它会生成名称的后续列，请使用模式"*columnname*1"，"*columnname*2"，"*columnname*3"，依次类推。If the object encounters duplicate columns while populating a , it generates names for the subsequent columns, using the pattern "*columnname*1", "*columnname*2", "*columnname*3", and so on. 如果传入的数据包含未命名的列，它们都将置于根据模式"Column1"、"Column2"等。If the incoming data contains unnamed columns, they are placed in the according to the pattern "Column1", "Column2", and so on. 多个结果集添加到时每个结果集放置在单独的表。When multiple result sets are added to the each result set is placed in a separate table. 通过将整数值追加到指定的表名 （例如，"Table"、"Table1"、"Table2"等。） 命名额外的结果集。Additional result sets are named by appending integral values to the specified table name (for example, "Table", "Table1", "Table2", and so on.). 使用列和表名称的应用程序应确保这些命名模式的冲突不会发生。Applications that use column and table names should make sure that conflicts with these naming patterns does not occur. ADO 中的值`Recordset`或`Record`对象将转换为公共语言运行时类型中的存储。Values in ADO `Recordset` or `Record` objects are converted to common language runtime types for storage in the . > [!NOTE] > 此重载方法隐式调用`Close`ADO 对象填充操作完成时。This overload of the method implicitly calls `Close` on the ADO object when the fill operation is complete. 下面的示例使用以填充使用 ADO `Recordset` ，它是一种 ADO`Record`对象。The following example uses an to fill a using an ADO `Recordset` that is an ADO `Record` object. 此示例假定你已经创建了 ADO`RecordSet`和`Record`对象。This example assumes that you have created an ADO `RecordSet` and `Record` object. ```vb Dim custDA As OleDbDataAdapter = New OleDbDataAdapter() Dim custDS As DataSet = New DataSet 'Use ADO objects from ADO library (msado15.dll) imported ' as.NET library ADODB.dll using TlbImp.exe Dim adoConn As ADODB.Connection = New ADODB.Connection() Dim adoRS As ADODB.Recordset = New ADODB.Recordset() adoConn.Open("Provider=SQLOLEDB;Data Source=localhost;Initial Catalog=Northwind;Integrated Security=SSPI;", "", "", -1) adoRS.Open("SELECT * FROM Customers", adoConn, ADODB.CursorTypeEnum.adOpenForwardOnly, ADODB.LockTypeEnum.adLockReadOnly, 1) custDA.Fill(custDS, adoRS, "Customers") adoConn.Close() ``` ```csharp OleDbDataAdapter custDA = new OleDbDataAdapter(); DataSet custDS = new DataSet(); //Use ADO objects from ADO library (msado15.dll) imported // as.NET library ADODB.dll using TlbImp.exe ADODB.Connection adoConn = new ADODB.Connection(); ADODB.Recordset adoRS = new ADODB.Recordset(); adoConn.Open("Provider=SQLOLEDB;Data Source=localhost;Initial Catalog=Northwind;Integrated Security=SSPI;", "", "", -1); adoRS.Open("SELECT * FROM Customers", adoConn, ADODB.CursorTypeEnum.adOpenForwardOnly, ADODB.LockTypeEnum.adLockReadOnly, 1); custDA.Fill(custDS, adoRS, "Customers"); adoConn.Close(); ```

span.span: The source table is invalid.

value.span: 在 过程中使用的 ，用于将与 中的新行相对应的记录插入到数据源中。

span.span: An used during to insert records in the data source that correspond to new rows in the .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 期间，如果未设置此属性和主键信息位于、可以自动生成，如果你设置属性和使用。During , if this property is not set and primary key information is present in the , the can be generated automatically if you set the property and use the . 然后，你未设置任何其他命令都由。Then, any additional commands that you do not set are generated by the . 此生成的逻辑需要要中存在的键列信息。This generation logic requires key column information to be present in the . 有关详细信息，请参阅[使用 Commandbuilder 生成命令](~/docs/framework/data/adonet/generating-commands-with-commandbuilders.md)。For more information, see [Generating Commands with CommandBuilders](~/docs/framework/data/adonet/generating-commands-with-commandbuilders.md). 当分配到以前创建、不克隆。When is assigned to a previously created , the is not cloned. 保留以前创建的引用对象。The maintains a reference to the previously created object. > [!NOTE] > 如果执行此命令返回行，这些行可能添加到具体取决于你如何设置属性对象。If execution of this command returns rows, these rows may be added to the depending on how you set the property of the object. ## Examples 下面的示例创建和设置和属性。The following example creates an and sets the and properties. 它假定你已创建对象。It assumes that you have already created an object. [!code-csharp[Classic WebData DbDataAdapter.InsertCommand Example#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_ADO.NET/Classic WebData DbDataAdapter.InsertCommand Example/CS/source.cs#1)] [!code-vb[Classic WebData DbDataAdapter.InsertCommand Example#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_ADO.NET/Classic WebData DbDataAdapter.InsertCommand Example/VB/source.vb#1)]

Public Custom Event RowUpdated As OleDbRowUpdatedEventHandler

summary.span: 在对数据源执行命令后的 过程中发生。

span.span: Occurs during after a command is executed against the data source.

summary.span: 尝试进行更新。

span.span: The attempt to update is made.

summary.span: 因此，事件发生。

span.span: Therefore, the event occurs.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 当你使用，有两个事件发生每个更新的数据行。When you use , there are two events that occur per data row updated. 执行顺序如下所示：The order of execution is as follows: 1. 中的值移动到的参数值。The values in the are moved to the parameter values. 2. 引发 事件。The event is raised. 3. 该命令执行。The command executes. 4. 如果该命令设置为`FirstReturnedRecord`，第一个返回结果将放置在。If the command is set to `FirstReturnedRecord`, the first returned result is placed in the . 5. 如果没有输出参数，它们都将置于。If there are output parameters, they are placed in the . 6. 引发 事件。The event is raised. 7. 调用 。 is called. ## Examples 下面的示例演示和正在使用的事件。The following example shows the and events being used. [!code-csharp[Classic WebData OleDbDataAdapter.RowUpdated Example#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_ADO.NET/Classic WebData OleDbDataAdapter.RowUpdated Example/CS/source.cs#1)] [!code-vb[Classic WebData OleDbDataAdapter.RowUpdated Example#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_ADO.NET/Classic WebData OleDbDataAdapter.RowUpdated Example/VB/source.vb#1)]

remarks.format: ## Remarks 当分配到以前创建、不克隆。When is assigned to a previously created , the is not cloned. 保留以前创建的引用对象。The maintains a reference to the previously created object. 如果不返回任何行，没有表将添加到，并且不引发任何异常。If the returns no rows, no tables are added to the , and no exception is raised. ## Examples 下面的示例创建和设置和属性。The following example creates an and sets the and properties. 它假定你已创建对象。It assumes that you have already created an object.
